resources.string: Email
Telephone number
Refuse
Authorize
%1$s would like permission to administer your app and to invite you to channels and groups. Authorize?
App Management
You have %1$d new messages

As we've recently informed you, SIMSme Business (now ginlo Business) has been handed over to Brabbler AG. That's why we'd like to ask for your consent (a) to transfer your contract and (b) to transfer your inventory, traffic, and message data to Brabbler Secure Message and Data Exchange AG (Brabbler AG) so that you can continue to use the messenger without restriction and to the same extent.
Your consent is voluntary, but if you don't give this consent, sending messages will no longer be possible as of %1$s and your account will be deactivated by %2$s. Further information on consent and your rights can be found %3$s.
Thank you!
Your SIMSme Team
http://sims.me/datenuebergang/business/en
You\'d like to continue using SIMSme Business (now ginlo Business) in the future? We\'re happy about that! So, don\'t wait and switch to Brabbler AG now.
Haven\'t had time yet to give your consent? Please take some time to agree to the provider change to Brabbler AG in order to continue using SIMSme Business (now ginlo Business).

Please agree to the provider change to Brabbler AG. Otherwise, you\'ll no longer be able to send messages as of now. And that would be a real pity. If you no longer want to use ginlo Business, please create a backup of your data.
If you want to send messages again with ginlo Business or create a backup of your data, please agree to the transfer of your contract to Brabbler AG now.
Your consent to the transfer of your data is required so that you can continue to use the messenger without restriction.
You will need this key to restore your backup later. Please keep it secure. Alternatively, you can use the QR code below.
Your backup key is:
Please set a password!
Warning: When you confirm the new registration you will overwrite your existing account. This action cannot be undone.\nIt is not possible to restore from backup later.
Enter your backup password and a backup key here.
We couldn\'t find a backup.
However, you can create one now if you\'re still logged in to ginlo Business on another device. It works like this:
Open your old SIMSme Business installation
Now let\'s find your backup.
Using your backup, you can get your existing content in here.
You can set a password for backup recovery here. This password will not be stored. If you forget it, your backup can not be restored. For this reason, do not forget your password!
Enter login code
Test now
days test for free
The 30-day test license has expired.
SIMSme Business is now available for a free 30-day trial
If you already hold a valid SIMSme Business license, please enter it now.
Test for Business

When you specify your email address, SIMSme can automatically find your colleagues with the same email domain. Your address is saved on our server in encrypted form.

Unfortunately, we have not found any contacts whose professional email address with the %1$s domain is linked with the account.\n\nAdvise colleagues who are already using SIMSme to link an email address.
Expand your network
Email directory
Phone book
Join me on ginlo Business, the secure business messenger

Hi!
I want to invite you to SIMSme Business. This is THE secure messenger specifically for companies.
Use the following to speed up communication with contacts and colleagues:
- Faster exchange on the team – individual and group chats, channels and distribution lists
- Simple sharing of contents – video and audio messages, photos and documents
- Working efficiently with colleagues – commenting, prioritising and delayed sending
- Available on all devices – computers, tablets and smartphones
Download the app now at https://www.sims.me/businessdl and try it out.
Kind regards
QR code validation has failed. Please try again.
Join me on ginlo, the secure messenger for private and confidential communication - made in Germany. Download it here: ginlo.net/join
We have sent an activation code to the following address: %1$s.
The activation code must consist of four alphanumeric characters.
Your email address %1$s has been successfully linked to your account.
Verifying that a license is available for your phone number
Remind me later
Extend license
Your license will expire in less than a week. Please request a license extension from your administrator.
License expires soon
Your license has expired. Please request a license extension from your administrator.
License notification
Later
Link

When you specify your email address, SIMSme can find your colleagues with the same email domain automatically. Your address is saved on our server in a one-way encrypted (hashed) format. We will send you an activation link for verification.
Link email
Email verification
Check your email inbox. We have sent a confirmation code to %1$s. Please enter the code here.
Leave this window open while you access your email inbox. Have you not received an email? Please also check your spam folder or request a new confirmation code.
Enter activation code
Activate license
Please enter the license code you received from your IT administrator.
Enter the login code
Enter your login code.
Checking the login code
The login code must consist of four times four characters.
Unfortunately, we weren\'t able to find a valid licence for this telephone number.
Request
If you have forgotten your password, you can ask your IT administrator for a recovery code to unlock the account.
Note: Your request will then be processed by your IT administrator. You will obtain the recovery code following corresponding approval.
Request recovery code
Unable to register the device for the push notifications service. To try again, close SIMSme using the back button and restart the app.
Deutsche Post AG guarantees the security of your information. With true end to-end encryption and a server located in Germany.
Now set up SIMSme for yourself and set your password. Your password is not transmitted to us and cannot be reset. So make sure to remember it!
GDPR-compliant

SIMSme encrypts all your messages in a secure and reliable manner as they travel from your device to the recipient\'s device — the messages cannot even be read from our servers. SIMSme also offers a number of other features that make your communication as secure as possible:
You have met in person and scanned the QR code
Your contact is using SIMSme. Ask them.
You have already been in contact via SIMSme
Your communication security level
Keep track of your contacts
The symbols indicate the status of your message
Determines how many minutes the program will be running in the background before it requests your password.
Determines whether SIMSme automatically creates a backup of your account information. The backup will be stored securely on the server.
Choose the image you want to display as a background in the chats.
If you activate this option, all media that you receive is automatically saved on your phone and can be viewed outside of SIMSme.
Deleting your account will irreversibly delete all of your chat history and SIMSme media. Your backups will become unusable.
